attributes.action: Extend the winter fuel payments to disabled people under 60 years of age who are on DLA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many disabled people who are on the higher rate of DLA need extra money to help pay for the high cost of fuel. Most of these people are unable to mobilise to keep warm.
Many people over 60 are are active and are still in receipt of earnings and do not require the winter fuel payment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
